resources.string: To start a new game, tap the new game button. Three difficulty options will be presented. \'Easy\' for easy words, \'Medium\' for average words, and \'Hard\' for the more experienced player. After selecting a difficulty, a new game will start. Tapping the quit button will exit the app and tapping the new game button will bring you back to the choose difficulty screen. To guess a letter, choose the button corresponding to the letter in the button box, choose the microphone to guess a letter by saying it out loud, or choose the button with the hand and squiggly line to write out the letter. Incorrect guesses will cause the hangman\'s body to be drawn. You lose if the entire body is drawn. Correct guesses will begin to fill in the word and guessed letters will appear in the \'Guessed letters\' box. Guess the entire word without completing the hangman\'s body and you win!\n\n Note: Letters guessed using gestures must be written in one stroke.
